name: Neon War (wyu1)
description:
Neon War is a game where you try to destroy the most neon circles.

This was made in about 6 hours for a one-day game jam.

The controls:

  • "w", "a", "s", "d" to move
  • left click to shoot

There are pickups which you can collect by moving onto them.

  • Power Ammo: 

Power ammo will do 10 damage and penetrate everything

  • Saw Shell:

This is a bullet that shoots bullets forward with a slight variation to the direction

  • Health Crystal:

Picking up one will give you 1 health

  • Land Mine:

These will blow up when hit by any entity that hits it and didn't place it. It fires 16-32 projectiles in random directions that do 1 damage each.
